Module com.example.sudokuproyecto2
Package com.example.sudokuproyecto2.model

Class Sudoku

java.lang.Object
com.example.sudokuproyecto2.model.Sudoku
public class Sudoku extends Object
Represents a Sudoku board and provides methods to initialize, solve, validate, and manipulate the game state.

  • Constructor Details

    • Sudoku

      public Sudoku(int size, int block_height, int block_width, int random_elements)
      Constructs a Sudoku board with given parameters.
      Parameters:
      size - board size (e.g., 6 for a 6x6 board)
      block_height - height of each block
      block_width - width of each block
      random_elements - number of cells to prefill randomly

  • Method Details

    • is_valid_user_move

      public boolean is_valid_user_move(int value, int row, int col)
      Validates a user's move by checking if the board remains solvable.
      Parameters:
      value - the number entered by the user
      row - the row position
      col - the column position
      Returns:
      true if the move is valid

    • help

      public boolean help()
      Finds a valid move to suggest to the user.
      Returns:
      true if a hint was found and stored

    • applyHelp

      public void applyHelp()
      Applies the last generated help to the board.

    • solve_board

      public void solve_board()
      Solves the board completely and updates the official board with the solution.
